description: Try our easy to follow Gluten-Free Pizza recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Gluten-Free Pizza Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat a pizza stone in a hot oven at 230Â°C (fan forced) and line two baking trays with baking paper.
Place one pizza base on each tray.
Spread tomato paste onto the base and top with sliced marinated artichokes, sliced red capsicum, black olives and buffalo mozzarella.
Slide onto pizza stone and bake for 10 to 15 minutes until base is golden and cheese has melted.
Finish with some small fresh basil leaves. Repeat with second dough portion.
